alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Coastal Harris; Inland Harris; Northern Liberty; Polk; San Jacinto; Southern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 3:26AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central San Jacinto, northern Chambers, Liberty, southeastern Polk and northeastern Harris Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 325 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Chester to near Cloverleaf. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northern Baytown, Galena Park, Jacinto City, Liberty, Dayton, Cloverleaf, Channelview, Highlands, Barrett, Crosby, Mont Belvieu, Anahuac, Old River-Winfree, Ames, Daisetta, Hardin, Kenefick, Cove, Devers and Dayton Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for southeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Chambers; Coastal Harris; Inland Harris; Northern Liberty; Polk; San Jacinto; Southern Liberty
